channel.title: Do I have any fans?
channel.description: [url='https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/member.php?u=251646']This[/url]guy really ticks me off. I mean [b]really [/b]ticks me off. He was originally trolling in the black mesa thread on steam for a while to the point that every post of mine resulted in little snide remarks from him. No matter what I did this jerk just had to push my buttons. I for one am tired of this guy following me around. I have already reported some of his posts, but them deleting his posts are not getting him to leave me alone and to stop stalking me. Anyone have any ideas to get this guy off my back?

item.title: Do I have any fans?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
raw_bean:

Catz this is the exact reason ignore lists are a major forum feature. It’s right there on the member profile page you posted (or of any other member who is bothering you): ‘Add user to ignore list’. Don’t let idiots on the internet even register with you, just blank them completely and go about your business as though they don’t even exist.

haha~! I am a woman and cant let anyone have the last word.

Read full topic

item.title: Do I have any fans?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Well winged one, there is actually a pretty good reason they are all separate.

The [color=darkorange] steam account to play games on is what holds all your games. What if you get banned and then create a new steam account for repurchase? Does that mean everything else should change over to your new account? Naw. 'Tisn’t needed.

The [color=red]steam support account is for reporting you cant get into your [color=darkorange]steam account or that there are account issues. If these two are tied together, then you cant make a ticket that there is something wrong with your account. (I am having this problem with facebook right now on my mom’s original account. In order to submit a ticket, you have to be logged in. Yet the login isnt working.)

And then there is the [color=royalblue]steam forum account to flub around on. People DO get themselves banned on the forums cuz they act like morons. We cant have them being banned from their account simply cuz they were stalking a kitty catz.

Read full topic

item.title: Do I have any fans?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

lol
Off-Topic: If I have a Steam account (I do), does that automatically make me have a Steam Forum Account? Like, are they linked? Because I’ve been trying to sign-in with my Steam account login and it won’t let me in!

You have a[color=darkorange] steam account to play games on
You have a [color=royalblue]steam forum account to post on the steam forums
You have a [color=red]steam support account for times you are having issues with your [color=darkorange]steam account

Each must be created separately.
:3

Read full topic

item.title: Do I have any fans?
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

At least blue lightning left the damn thread for a while. He popped up again last week, but I think he will go away for a while again. But badsmed just kept popping up once in a while sending sucker punches at me. I think he was looking for times where he could send a zinger and I wasnt looking, thus making him look good.

I called him my “personal troll” once, and a moderator asked me to not respond, but to only report him.

Y’know, most forums have an ‘ignore’ feature.

Read full topic
